provider.name: Swedbank
provider.description:
!!! Swedbank mobile website was shut down. Not possible to update provider... !!!
Retrieves the balance of the bank account in Swedbank through internet bank system. To save the bandwidth, the mobile version of internet-banking is used: https://mobilbank.swedbank.se/ To login to the internet banking, the personal password is used, which allow very limited action in internet banking, so it is relatively safe to use the personal password here. You need to login to your internet banking with more safe method (using security device, etc.) to order the personal password if you do not have it yet.
provider.author: valeravi <valeravi@vi-soft.com.ua>
